post.body:
More marriages lasted, kids were raised by their mothers instead of the state, homes were cleaner and better administered, women and men were happier, quality of life was considerably better. 

Now the hens abandon the nest as soon as they can just to preen and chase shiny objects that make them feel like they have some type of control. 

If we were any other animal, scientists would be alarmed at our behavior.  We are devolving in real time.

body:
Don't blame them, the government forced them.

In smaller countries, like Finland and Sweden, they get 2-3 hour school days, no homework, only 10 grades, more electives, and longer breaks (a month for our typical one-week breaks but they still have the full 2.5 month summer). However in the larger countries like England and China, they're even worse than the US. What it comes down to is that schools are more of a political and business game than education, and you're seeing the larger countries being more concerned with competing with each other education-wise than actually educating people. It's awful but it gets the politicians and school corporations money and that's all that matters.

What it comes down to is that schools are more of a political and business game than education, and you're seeing the larger countries being more concerned with competing with each other education-wise than actually educating people. It's awful but it gets the politicians and school corporations money and that's all that matters.

post.body:
I took a pretty long break from reddit and when I returned it was like every comment and post was so....idiotic. I felt like I lost IQ points reading some of those comments.

I am now convinced that the majority of reddit is not normal. I could not see this when visiting the site every day, or even every few days. But to take 4-5 weeks off and revisit that site? Oh gosh. They all sound idiotic. Like, these people have no life experience or common sense/critical thinking skills whatsoever. They are either bots or high school kids who just don't understand anything about how life works. Especially when it comes to America and the American economy/federal reserve/history of centralized banking. It would be alarming if I wasn't so sure it is 90% bots and people who are not old enough to vote.

I guess my point is that reading posts and comments on Reddit always made me feel a little uncomfortable, but I could never quite put my finger on why and after taking an extended absence I think I have figured it out.... being there made me uncomfortable because of the unbridled ignorance on full display there.
post.body_html:

They are either bots or high school kids who just don't understand anything about how life works. Especially when it comes to America and the American economy/federal reserve/history of centralized banking. It would be alarming if I wasn't so sure it is 90% bots and people who are not old enough to vote.

I guess my point is that reading posts and comments on Reddit always made me feel a little uncomfortable, but I could never quite put my finger on why and after taking an extended absence I think I have figured it out.... being there made me uncomfortable because of the unbridled ignorance on full display there.

body: I disagree that it should be, I think this division of half of people from the other half is very unfortunate, especially for males who are naturally disposable and get stuck with all the bad things except having a uterus, but it's a reality that we need to survive. Life was never the dreamland where anything is possible like we were told as kids, but a random, meaningless world of mostly pain and struggling, to some more than others. Some people have everything they want, others don't, and others have everything they don't want. But trying to defy reality will simply create even more problems.

parent.body:
Trannies come loaded with drama and even gay people - esp. gay men- can't take it.  Trannies make life so difficult and gender fluid may be the worst. I avoid trannies as much as possible.
Also, the males trying to pretend to be females still have high levels of testosterone and so are as physically aggressive as males are and there are many videos showing this. I recently had a fit when my landlord suggested having a gender fluid trannie dude (wanna-be female) move in.  I am moving away from this crazy landlord sooooooon. Men and women are *not* the same creatures and nor should they be.  Androgyny is rather acceptable to me and trying to be a sex you are not when androgyny is such a natural, flexible option just seems ridiculous -- as silly as dressing up your dog or cat.
I resent *anyone* who rejects reality and don't even think lying to kids about the Easter Bunny or Santa Claus or god is a mentally healthy thing to do.
If you can 100% pass as another sex, this trannie thing would almost not even be an issue.  Most males simply cannot pass as females -- no matter how many surgeries or hormones they take. Men have their own beauty (think of the Greek gods and cultures of them) and women do, too.  There is no good reason to hate the sex you were born into -- and it is as mentally damaging as hating your own race (the physical traits, not the cultural traits). Accept the body you were born into and work on making the best of your MIND/BRAIN and take advantage of the body you were born into. Make lemonaide out of lemons -- if you wanna consider your sex as a negative in the first place,

parent.body:
> Females are simply smarter overall

You keep repeating the same flagrant lie after I debunk it with actual data. This does not make it true.

> However most of them are coddled and not pressured to succeed nearly as much as boys

That doesn't change your IQ, you complete moron, it is innate.

> the potential is there but they don't cultivate it

I've already told you that you wanting something to be true doesn't make it true; that you're making these claims without any **actual proof** and you just keep repeating the same bullshit over and over again.

> almost always excel above the majority of the men

... so do the men. *facepalm*

> Even in "male" fields such as STEM and computers, females have been shown to still have a slight edge

I've already told you that you wanting something to be true doesn't make it true; that you're making these claims without any **actual proof** and you just keep repeating the same bullshit over and over again.

> women have more active brains, optimize for thinking and creativity and intuition

I've already told you that you wanting something to be true doesn't make it true; that you're making these claims without any **actual proof** and you just keep repeating the same bullshit over and over again.

> use both hemispheres, as opposed to only making use of the left side of the brain 

Each statement dumber than the last. All people use both hemispheres. That's why they're there. To be used.

post.body:
More marriages lasted, kids were raised by their mothers instead of the state, homes were cleaner and better administered, women and men were happier, quality of life was considerably better. 

Now the hens abandon the nest as soon as they can just to preen and chase shiny objects that make them feel like they have some type of control. 

If we were any other animal, scientists would be alarmed at our behavior.  We are devolving in real time.

body: Not all of it is social. The brain is a sex-specific organ and male and female ones are wired and built completely differently. Some of it exists since birth or infancy, but most of it develops during puberty. Female is the default biologically, so this is why boys tend to lose their creativity and joyfulness, and to some extent their learning capacity, throughout adolescence while the women retain it. This happens because historically males needed to be good at strength, aggression, and spatial skills, so they trade in their talent in logic and creativity to specialize there. This is why men and women are so different. Unfortunately it's completely unfair, with almost everything bad being pinned on the men and the women hogging all the good things, with the exception of uterus pains. However until very recently it was essential; *someone* had to sacrifice their lives to do all the tough dirtywork no one wanted to do, and as men are the more expendable ones (one man can impregnate 10 women but 10 men and one woman can still only have 1 child) it naturally falls on them.
body_html: Not all of it is social. The brain is a sex-specific organ and male and female ones are wired and built completely differently. Some of it exists since birth or infancy, but most of it develops during puberty. Female is the default biologically, so this is why boys tend to lose their creativity and joyfulness, and to some extent their learning capacity, throughout adolescence while the women retain it. This happens because historically males needed to be good at strength, aggression, and spatial skills, so they trade in their talent in logic and creativity to specialize there. This is why men and women are so different. Unfortunately it's completely unfair, with almost everything bad being pinned on the men and the women hogging all the good things, with the exception of uterus pains. However until very recently it was essential; someone had to sacrifice their lives to do all the tough dirtywork no one wanted to do, and as men are the more expendable ones (one man can impregnate 10 women but 10 men and one woman can still only have 1 child) it naturally falls on them.

body: Supposedly the point is to casually identify with the other gender. But in practice most of them are neon-haired SJWs who do nothing but talk about how trans they are and how they need special privileges and how they're victims and everyone who doesn't do all these things for them is a BIGOT. You know, if you didn't scream "I'M TRANS VALIDATE ME!!!!" all the time, people wouldn't realize and "discriminate" against you in the first place (though I'm not convinced there's much discrimination regardless). And the made-up genders are also ridiculous, there are only two and that's completely obvious to anyone with half a brain, snowflake adjectives are not genders, they are adjectives. I think they're just looking for attention.

body:
If you'd been reading my comments I already explained this. Females are simply smarter overall, so a simple shift to the right. However most of them are coddled and not pressured to succeed nearly as much as boys (if a man fails he's a bum, if a girl doesn't do anything she's a perfectly normal wife) and so they become lazy and occupied with girly crap. This is why they don't reach the right side of the curve as often, the potential is there but they don't cultivate it. Because let's be honest, less than 0.01% of people are going to work hard, or even at all, if they don't have to. The tiny handful who do however almost always excel to a large degree, above the majority of the men, including the geniuses.

Even in "male" fields such as STEM and computers, females have been shown to still have a slight edge (though only about 4%, but it'd likely be bigger if they had more confidence). And in the non-STEM fields, men don't stand a chance against the women. This lines up with brain scans that show women have more active brains, optimize for thinking and creativity and intuition (males optimize motor skills instead), and use both hemispheres and have more connections between hemispheres, as opposed to only making use of the left side of the brain (Einstein's brain this too).
body_html:
If you'd been reading my comments I already explained this. Females are simply smarter overall, so a simple shift to the right. However most of them are coddled and not pressured to succeed nearly as much as boys (if a man fails he's a bum, if a girl doesn't do anything she's a perfectly normal wife) and so they become lazy and occupied with girly crap. This is why they don't reach the right side of the curve as often, the potential is there but they don't cultivate it. Because let's be honest, less than 0.01% of people are going to work hard, or even at all, if they don't have to. The tiny handful who do however almost always excel to a large degree, above the majority of the men, including the geniuses.

Even in "male" fields such as STEM and computers, females have been shown to still have a slight edge (though only about 4%, but it'd likely be bigger if they had more confidence). And in the non-STEM fields, men don't stand a chance against the women. This lines up with brain scans that show women have more active brains, optimize for thinking and creativity and intuition (males optimize motor skills instead), and use both hemispheres and have more connections between hemispheres, as opposed to only making use of the left side of the brain (Einstein's brain this too).

body:
> I absolutely despise AngstKitten and would rejoice at news of her misfortune, therefore it cannot be true that "everyone likes AngstKitten". Maybe everyone in your shithole Discord bubble does, but said shithole is not representative of all Ruqqus.

That doesn't mean everyone else does just because you're a devilish jerk. Like her or not she was a huge contributor. I don't like most reddit powerusers but I can't deny that they contribute a lot. And you're naive if you think *I'm* part of that discord bubble. I'm literally the most vocal voice against it.

> So you're admitting your statement is false. You said are, not were. Great. Having been a top poster over half a year ago doesn't make you a top poster now.

My point was that if she had remained active, she would still be a top poster. Even now in her relative inactivity, she still far outranks most users, even us active ones, purely due to natural ability. And I see that way more often in female users than male ones. Which makes sense, because despite the internet being mostly male-oriented, females have 2 important biological advantages. The first is that they're better at social interactions, so they connect an engage better with users, and have a more distinctive and recognizable persona. The second is that they're more creative and emotional, giving them a huge edge in content creation that most men simply don't have. This is mostly down to how the brain is wired and not personality; if it was, I and the other male users would be like them and not tryhards who just make up shit content or copy things we barely understand.
body_html:
I absolutely despise AngstKitten and would rejoice at news of her misfortune, therefore it cannot be true that "everyone likes AngstKitten". Maybe everyone in your shithole Discord bubble does, but said shithole is not representative of all Ruqqus.

That doesn't mean everyone else does just because you're a devilish jerk. Like her or not she was a huge contributor. I don't like most reddit powerusers but I can't deny that they contribute a lot. And you're naive if you think I'm part of that discord bubble. I'm literally the most vocal voice against it.

So you're admitting your statement is false. You said are, not were. Great. Having been a top poster over half a year ago doesn't make you a top poster now.

My point was that if she had remained active, she would still be a top poster. Even now in her relative inactivity, she still far outranks most users, even us active ones, purely due to natural ability. And I see that way more often in female users than male ones. Which makes sense, because despite the internet being mostly male-oriented, females have 2 important biological advantages. The first is that they're better at social interactions, so they connect an engage better with users, and have a more distinctive and recognizable persona. The second is that they're more creative and emotional, giving them a huge edge in content creation that most men simply don't have. This is mostly down to how the brain is wired and not personality; if it was, I and the other male users would be like them and not tryhards who just make up shit content or copy things we barely understand.

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

guild.description:
For memes and shitposting about everything that happens in our beloved "Official Ruqqus Discord"
 
---

## Posting Rules


Rule 1: 

This guild is for shitposting about people/events in the Ruqqus Discord server. Any post that is not related to this will be kicked to +general. If you need help regarding the discord server, +askruqqus, +general, or +hub would gladly accept your questions.


Rule 2:

No spamming. Spamming would be considered any of the following:

* Same-format posting within a day

* Same-content posting within a day (Same content, different format)


Spammed posts will get kicked and repeated offenses results in being exiled.


Rule 3: 

No reposts: reposts are cringe. Any reposts will be kicked.

body:
I didn't say it was common for women to be smarter than men. Actually I think it is but only overall. There are far more men who are geniuses.

What I said was that this is not due to biological reasons, but because girls are coddled and they're allowed to be lazy and do nothing with their lives; and let's be honest, barely anyone is not going to be lazy unless they're forced to work. Since women maintain average intelligence in spite of this, this alone should be evidence of their superior intelligence capability. Yet we also have the few women who do have legit interests, and most of them are insanely talented and brilliant. There are far fewer female geniuses, but they are significantly smarter than the far more common male ones.

Since women maintain average intelligence in spite of this, this alone should be evidence of their superior intelligence capability. Yet we also have the few women who do have legit interests, and most of them are insanely talented and brilliant. There are far fewer female geniuses, but they are significantly smarter than the far more common male ones.

parent.body:
Not what I meant. I meant that you only addressed the end, not the middle or start of the comment, which is still true, and which you still haven't, because you know I'm right.

... and two is *not* consistent, since you're implying that it is common for women to be smarter than men, which it isn't, because, **as you stated**, men are more variable, therefore it is much likelier to find a man at the top end of the spectrum than a woman.

Point 1 does not contradict point 2, but both points contradict your argument in general.

post.body:
More marriages lasted, kids were raised by their mothers instead of the state, homes were cleaner and better administered, women and men were happier, quality of life was considerably better. 

Now the hens abandon the nest as soon as they can just to preen and chase shiny objects that make them feel like they have some type of control. 

If we were any other animal, scientists would be alarmed at our behavior.  We are devolving in real time.

More marriages lasted, kids were raised by their mothers instead of the state, homes were cleaner and better administered, women and men were happier, quality of life was considerably better.

Now the hens abandon the nest as soon as they can just to preen and chase shiny objects that make them feel like they have some type of control.

If we were any other animal, scientists would be alarmed at our behavior. We are devolving in real time.
post.title: Life was better before women joined the workforce.

body:
> I don't know what kind of mental gymnastics got you to that conclusion. The way you imply that you should just take claims like that at face value bothers me. Not only are you disgustingly credulous, you want others to be like that also.

You're the one accusing no_chill of lying. I don't think the burden of proof has ever been on the defendant, but the accuser.

> LOL. Every argument is dumber than the last. "Admins like her, so she is good" https://yourlogicalfallacyis.com/appeal-to-authority

It's not just the admins. It's everyone. I'm the biggest whiner about the admins in fact, I don't appeal to authority. AngstKitten was probably *the* top ruqqus user ever since she joined in May, until this fall or late summer when she stopped being as active. You didn't join until July so you'd only remember the very end when she was already quieting down.

parent.body:
> You're the one asserting no_chill is a man, against her claims; the burden of proof is on you.

I don't know what kind of mental gymnastics got you to that conclusion. The way you imply that you should just take claims like that at face value bothers me. Not only are you disgustingly credulous, you want others to be like that also. You've only proved that the burden of proof is on him, rather than on you, not that it is on me.

LOL. Every argument is dumber than the last. "Admins like her, so she is good" https://yourlogicalfallacyis.com/appeal-to-authority

Pick up a damned Philosophy textbook and learn a thing or two about logical fallacies before you try arguing.
